item.title: Simple Plan - Addicted
item.description:
I heard you’re doing
okay But I want
You to know
I’m a dick
I’m addicted to you
I can’t pretend
I don’t care When you
don’t think about me
Do you think
I deserve this?
I tried to make you
happy but
You left anyway
I’m trying to forget
That I’m
addicted to you
But I want it
and need it
I’m addicted to you
Now it’s over
Can’t forget
what you said
And I never wanna do
this again
Heartbreaker
Heartbreaker
Heartbreaker
Since the day
I met you
And after all
We’ve been through
I’m still a dick
I’m addicted to you
I think you know
That it’s true
I’d run a thousand
Miles to get you
Do you think I
Deserve this?
I tried to make you
Happy I did all that
I could Just to keep
You But
you left anyway

that I’m
Addicted to you

Need it I’m
addicted to you

forget what you said

I be waiting?
Until the
end of time
